|1effect=At start of turn, inflicts【Panic】,【Exposure】, and【Deep Wounds】on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.<br><br>Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and also, for unit's first attack during combat, if damage dealt prior to damage reduction calculation < foe's HP - 1, sets damage before damage reduction as foe's HP - 1 (excluding area-of-effect Specials; excluding certain foes, such as Røkkr).<br><br>【Panic】<br>Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.<br><br>【Exposure】<br>Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.<br><br>【Deep Wounds】<br>Unit's HP cannot be healed through its next action.
|1cost=300
|1required=-
